Control Name: Implement a risk-assessment process that: Is performed at least annually and upon significant changes to the environment (for example, acquisition, merger, relocation, etc.),Identifies critical assets, threats, and vulnerabilities, and\n- Results in a formal, documented analysis of risk. Examples of risk-assessment methodologies include but are not limited to OCTAVE, ISO 27005 and NIST SP 800-30.
